full_summary:
# [Tender ID] 2BP2-117792

## [English Title]
### 36 Month Lease for a High Capacity Printer for RCMP K Division

## [French Title]
### 36 moisis de location d'une imprimante à haute capacité pour la Division K de la GRC

## [Notice Details]
- [Publication Date]: October 17, 2022
- [Tender Closing Date]: November 21, 2022 (14:00:00)
- [Contracting Entity]: Shared Services Canada

## [Notice Information]
Bid Opening Notice - Amendment 003

## [Description]
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police has a requirement for a 36-month lease for one (1) high capacity printer with three (3) one-year option periods. The lease is for the RCMP K Division print shop.

## [Trade Agreements]
This procurement may be subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

## [Submission Requirements]
Tenders are invited based on a request for proposal (RFP) process. Bidders must submit their proposal in accordance with the tender documents provided.

## [Proposal Submission]
All proposals must be submitted electronically through the Shared Services Canada procurement website by the closing date and time specified.

## [Contact Information]
For further information or to request a copy of the tender documents:

* Channary Luy
* Email: [channary.luy@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:channary.luy@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-323-5347
* Fax: 613-123-4567

The rewritten text is easier to read and navigate, and it includes only relevant information that is necessary for the tender. 

**Important details that are included in the rewritten text:**

* Notice details (publication date, tender closing date, contracting entity)
* Description of the project
* Trade agreements
